name: May's Flowers DEMO
description:
CONTROLS: "WASD" to move, "E" to confirm, "T" to pause.

Welcome to the demo version of May's Flowers! Created within 20 days for the #GreatSpringGameJam2022 ! Gather as many flowers as you can to keep your flower shop in business!

This is my first ever game release so I am very excited for a game of mine to be publicly played! Be sure to follow @SkidesGames on Twitter for future updates on #MaysFlowers

Credits:
-Thank you to  @EmmanuelNSmith on Twitter for creating the music for the game, and thank you to Andrew Greco for game design advice and my fellow friends and family for playtesting my game.

-Font used in the game: "Rainy Hearts"

PLANNED FEATURES:
- Flower breeding
- Equip-able items
- NPC quests and scenarios
- Weather and Map Randomization
- RNG Events
-& MORE!

Please feel free to leave constructive feedback about the game!
